properties.Name: LegalAction

Columns.Name: LegalActionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Action.

Columns.Name: LegalActionDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Legal Action.

Columns.Name: LegalActionInitiatedDate
Columns.Description: The date that the legal action was initiated.

Columns.Name: LegalActionTerminatedDate
Columns.Description: The date that the legal action was terminated or concluded.

Columns.Name: LegalActionRequestedAmount
Columns.Description: The amount requested in conjunction with the Legal Action.

Columns.Name: LegalActionAwardAmount
Columns.Description: The amount awarded in conjunction with the Legal Action.

Columns.Name: LegalActionNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the legal action.

Columns.Name: LegalActionTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Action Type.

Columns.Name: LegalActionStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Action Status.

Columns.Name: LegalActionFiledInLocationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Location.
